scripts.prep: copyfiles analytics.js dist && concat node_modules/material-design-lite/material.min.js node_modules/seedrandom/seedrandom.min.js > dist/lib.js
scripts.build-html: copyfiles index.html dist && copyfiles index_cnn.html dist && copyfiles index_rnn.html dist
scripts.watch-html: concat index.html -o dist/index.html && concat index_cnn.html -o dist/index_cnn.html && concat index_rnn.html -o dist/index_rnn.html
scripts.build: npm run prep && npm run build-js && npm run buildcnn-js && npm run buildrnn-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-html
scripts.watch: npm run prep && concurrently "npm run watch-js" "npm run watchcnn-js" "npm run watchrnn-js" "npm run watch-css" "npm run watch-html"
scripts.serve-watch: concurrently "http-server -o -c-1 dist/" "npm run watch" "npm run watchcnn" "npm run watchrnn"
